## Description {#details}

Implementation of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/format-provider">format&#95;provider&lt;T&gt;</a> for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">llvm::Twine</a>.

This follows the same rules as the string formatter.

Definition at line 219 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/formatproviders-h">FormatProviders.h</a>.
